displayProperties.description:
Complete the weapon objective to unlock its Pattern and Resonant Elements. 

Check the objective in the weapon tooltip or details screen.
displayProperties.name: Shaping: Extraction

3956285601.displaySource: "We must tune our instruments before we can expect them to play in the correct key." —Ikora Rey

displayProperties.description:
A Deepsight Resonant weapon can provide Weapon Pattern progress by extracting the pattern in the weapon details screen. Dismantling the weapon also gives Weapon Pattern progress. 

Extract or dismantle a Resonant weapon to progress. 

This process only provides one segment of a Weapon's Pattern. Once the extraction or dismantle is complete, all the Resonance is consumed for that weapon.
displayProperties.name: Shaping: Extraction

displayProperties.description: Return to the Relic Conduit in the Enclave on Mars.
displayProperties.name: Shaping: Extraction

3956285603.displaySource: "The extraction is complete, but what will you do with it?" —Ghost

3298272589.displaySource:
"The Dawning brings us all together, Guardian. Even those of us who have drifted apart over the last year," Eva says to you, gesturing to the bustling Tower around you.

"Take this moment and reach out to someone you miss, or someone who misses you," Eva says.

"We've even made these special cards to help old friends find each other again. Take a look, choose a card, and see where it leads you!"

setData.questStepSummary: Eva Levante asks you to check your Event Card for the Dawning. She says the objectives listed there will help you along your Dawning journey, and help you reconnect with old friends and acquaintances you may not have spoken to since last Dawning!

setData.questStepSummary: You have climbed to the summit and proven yourself a Guardian among Guardians. Celebrate your achievements, but remember to keep your eyes on the prize.

displayProperties.description: Complete the mission "A Guardian Rises."
displayProperties.name: A Guardian Rises

505143283.displaySource: "Is it really you? After all this time…" —Ghost

setData.questStepSummary: Your life as a Guardian has begun. Aided by your Ghost, you must escape the Cosmodrome and find a way to the Last City.

displayProperties.description: Complete the mission "Schism."
displayProperties.name: A Guardian Rises

2987833505.displaySource: "A Guardian's fireteam is their family. I'm not resting till I have mine back." —Shaw Han

setData.questStepSummary: Newly reborn as a Guardian, your search for a jumpship led you to Shaw Han. With his fireteam missing, Shaw needs your help to save them and continue his mission before he can take you to the Last City.

displayProperties.description: Find Shaw Han at his camp.
displayProperties.name: A Guardian Rises

2955116910.displaySource: "The Traveler's Light can only do so much against the Darkness. It's the risk we all take…" —Shaw Han

setData.questStepSummary: You tried to help Shaw Han save his fireteam from the Hive, but it was too late. He's asked you to regroup with him at his makeshift campsite.

displayProperties.description: Purchase any daily bounty from Shaw Han in the Cosmodrome.
displayProperties.name: A Guardian Rises

3039004941.displaySource: "The Traveler's Light can only do so much against the Darkness. It's the risk we all take…" —Shaw Han

setData.questStepSummary: You were unable to help Shaw Han save his fireteam. Now he's relying on you to help recover a Golden Age relic called a superconductor, which is currently inaccessible. He's tasked you with finding intel to determine the next steps.

displayProperties.description: Sync with Shaw's ship near his camp.
displayProperties.name: A Guardian Rises

2972041656.displaySource: "If you can get Ghost to sync with my ship, we can send this whole operation into overdrive!"  —Shaw Han

setData.questStepSummary: Ghost needs to sync with Shaw's ship, allowing him to relay Fallen Data Scraps.

displayProperties.description: Defeat Fallen to recover data scraps.
displayProperties.name: A Guardian Rises

605956092.displaySource: "The Fallen have torn this place apart over time. If there was anything useful here, I'd bet they got their claws on it." —Shaw Han

setData.questStepSummary: You were unable to help Shaw Han save his fireteam. Now he's relying on you to help recover a Golden Age relic called a superconductor, which is currently inaccessible. He's tasked you with finding intel to determine the next steps.

displayProperties.description: Find Shaw back at his camp.
displayProperties.name: A Guardian Rises

2818924418.displaySource: "These facilities are ancient; databases are corrupted, too, so my Ghost can't even download info. Whatever you can find will help." —Shaw Han

setData.questStepSummary: Shaw Han enlisted you to help his mission by searching for intel on the Cosmodrome facilities. You found an intriguing schematic that Shaw would like to see.

displayProperties.description: Complete the mission "Cold Boot."
displayProperties.name: A Guardian Rises

772305163.displaySource: "Time for your first mission, new Light. I'm counting on you to handle your half of the equation. Don't doubt yourself; you've got this." —Shaw Han

setData.questStepSummary: An overload of energy blocks access to the relic that Shaw seeks, but he believes balancing the power grid will solve the problem. He needs you to activate a dormant comms array to redistribute power.

displayProperties.description: Return to Shaw at his camp.
displayProperties.name: A Guardian Rises

1491176377.displaySource: "Hundreds of years of rust and atrophy, and it… just works. Took a good kick to get it going, mind you, but still. The Golden Age was something else." —Shaw Han

setData.questStepSummary: You activated the array and balanced the Cosmodrome power grid, aiding Shaw on his mission. With the superconductor finally accessible, Shaw wants to talk about next steps.

displayProperties.description: Complete the mission "Vendetta."
displayProperties.name: A Guardian Rises

1591989154.displaySource: "No Guardian should have to face the Darkness alone. We stand together, no matter what." —Ghost

setData.questStepSummary: Shaw left to recover the superconductor alone in an attempt to protect you. With Navôta still at large, you must catch up to him before the Hive claim another Light.

displayProperties.description: Report back to Shaw at his camp.
displayProperties.name: A Guardian Rises

1793614740.displaySource: "Doesn't matter what kind of mess you're in. Sun always rises. Keep your eyes up and watch for the light." —Shaw Han

setData.questStepSummary: The superconductor has been recovered, and Navôta is gone for now. With Shaw safe and the mission complete, it's time to regroup.

displayProperties.description: Travel to the Tower
displayProperties.name: A Guardian Rises

1743281883.displaySource: "We are what remains of the Light, and we will not be stamped out." —The Speaker

setData.questStepSummary: Shaw, having received new orders from Zavala, sent you to deliver the superconductor to the Vanguard. The Last City awaits you.

displayProperties.description: Travel to the Tower in the Last City.
displayProperties.name: A Guardian Rises

3706704623.displaySource: "The City started as tents and campfires in the shadow of the Traveler. What it's turned into is… incredible." —Ghost

setData.questStepSummary: Shaw, having received new orders from Zavala, sent you to deliver the superconductor to the Vanguard. The Last City awaits you.

displayProperties.description: Complete your tour of the Tower in the "Advent" quest.
displayProperties.name: A Guardian Rises

displayProperties.description:
Complete the strike "The Disgraced" by accessing the Vanguard playlist screen in the Destinations screen.

Vanguard playlists utilize matchmaking to help you team up with other Guardians.
displayProperties.name: A Guardian Rises

339159260.displaySource: "Cas… Maeve… I owe you both so much. We're going to make sure you're the last Lights Navôta ever snuffs out. I swear it." —Shaw Han

setData.questStepSummary: While the Vanguard analyzes the superconductor, Navôta still roams freely in the Cosmodrome. Zavala has tasked you with tracking and eliminating the Hive Wizard once and for all.

displayProperties.description: Complete the "Darkness's Doorstep" mission.
displayProperties.name: Beyond Light

setData.questStepSummary: The Darkness beckons you to Europa. Will you answer its call?

displayProperties.description: Complete "The Arrival" mission.
displayProperties.name: The Witch Queen

setData.questStepSummary: Mars has returned from the abyss, and Savathûn's ship hovers in its sky. Ikora Rey and Eris Morn require your assistance to track down the elusive Witch Queen.

displayProperties.description: Complete the "First Contact" mission.
displayProperties.name: Lightfall

setData.questStepSummary: Find Osiris, sow chaos in Calus's fleet, and make landing on Neptune.

displayProperties.description: Cross the threshold and discover what lies within the Traveler.
displayProperties.name: The Final Shape

setData.questStepSummary: Operation: Ahamkara is a go. Follow the Vanguard through the portal, wherever it leads.

displayProperties.description: Defeat a Primeval found within Gambit.
displayProperties.name: Malfeasance

displayProperties.description: Reset your Crucible Rank.
displayProperties.name: Tex Mechanica Tournament

displayProperties.description: Present this talisman to an Awoken warrior within the Shattered Throne.
displayProperties.name: Wish-Ender

displayProperties.description: Defeat combatants. Stronger combatants grant more progress.
displayProperties.name: Blast from the Past

2464189896.displaySource: "As long as you're helping, the gunsmith asked me to gather some combat data for a project of his. It's a tribute to an old friend. Could use a hand." —Shaw Han

displayProperties.description: Defeat combatants with your Super and other class abilities. Supers grant the most efficient progress.
displayProperties.name: Blast from the Past

82312451.displaySource: "Good start. There are more data requests here. I know it's not the most pressing, but it's important to help each other out these days. You up for it?" —Shaw Han

displayProperties.description: Present this Holliday Family Blueprint data to Banshee-44 in the Tower.
displayProperties.name: Blast from the Past

2665815610.displaySource: "Banshee is gonna be thrilled with this. You should take it to him yourself; he never forgets a favor." —Shaw Han

displayProperties.description:
Come back after Banshee has had time to analyze the data.

Complete the quest "A Guardian Rises."
displayProperties.name: Blast from the Past

2632260305.displaySource: "Huh… well, I would have lost that bet. Strange patterns here…" —Banshee-44

displayProperties.description: Return to Banshee-44 in the Tower.
displayProperties.name: Blast from the Past

2615482721.displaySource: "This weapon will be right at home in your arsenal… with some adjustments." —Banshee-44

displayProperties.description: Collect data by defeating combatants and completing public events on Europa.
displayProperties.name: Blast from the Past

283938165.displaySource: "Need you to chill out on Europa for a bit. No, I mean literally." —Banshee-44

displayProperties.description: Defeat targets with precision damage and defeat targets with Shotguns in Gambit or Crucible matches. Guardians grant the most efficient progress.
displayProperties.name: Blast from the Past

183125260.displaySource: "One more step should do it. Crucible time. Need to see how this thing performs against other Guardians." —Banshee-44

displayProperties.description: Return the finished data to Banshee-44.
displayProperties.name: Blast from the Past

2532286206.displaySource: "You've crunched enough numbers to make Rahool sweat. Let's put that data to good use." —Banshee-44

displayProperties.description:
Defeat foes of the Traveler wherever they're found.

More powerful foes grant additional progress.
displayProperties.name: The Queen Beckons

setData.questStepSummary: The schematic requires recorded combat data to refactor.

displayProperties.description: Defeat combatants using your abilities or Super.
displayProperties.name: The Queen Beckons

setData.questStepSummary: Combat data centering on subclass abilities and Supers is required for further refactoring.

displayProperties.description: Complete the quest "A Guardian Rises" while you wait for the schematic to finish processing the data.
displayProperties.name: The Queen Beckons

setData.questStepSummary: Data gathering was successful; the schematic is now computing.

displayProperties.description: Bring the schematic to Banshee-44 in the Tower Courtyard.
displayProperties.name: The Queen Beckons

1537874741.displaySource:
Banshee is distant, taking far too long to notice your presence.

"Hm? Schematic? Yeah. Calibrate. Throne World."

setData.questStepSummary: The schematic has finished processing the data it collected. Bring it to Banshee-44 in the Tower Courtyard.

displayProperties.description: Defeat combatants and complete public events on the newly discovered destination: Throne World.
displayProperties.name: The Queen Beckons

setData.questStepSummary: Banshee-44 says the only way to take this schematic to the next level is to gather combat data on Savathûn's throne world.

displayProperties.description:
Defeat targets while using any Auto Rifle.

Defeated Guardians grant additional progress.
displayProperties.name: The Queen Beckons

setData.questStepSummary: The schematic is nearly complete, requiring only data from Auto Rifles.

displayProperties.description: Deliver the completed schematic to Banshee-44 in the Tower Courtyard.
displayProperties.name: The Queen Beckons

3735051218.displaySource:
The gears turn in Banshee's head. Distant connections solidify into recognition.

"Right, let's see what you learned in the Throne World."

Banshee tinkers away at the workbench behind him, slowly turning with a completed weapon.

"Sweet, now back to business."

setData.questStepSummary: The schematic is ready to be used; bring it to Banshee-44 in the Tower Courtyard.

displayProperties.description:
Complete the "Transmigration" mission in the Pale Heart. Defeat combatants with abilities and your Super.

"Transmigration" is found in the Pale Heart in the Destinations tab of the Director.
displayProperties.name: New Light Armor Requisition

2561829998.displaySource:
"Now that you're equipped, go flex your power," Ikora encourages you. "See what you're capable of."

"There's a situation in the Pale Heart that could use your help," she continues. "Head there and test the boundaries of your Light."

"Once you've proven that you've got the mettle for battle, come back and we'll finish getting you geared up."

setData.questStepSummary: Earn battle-ready armor by proving your mastery of the Light to Ikora Rey.

displayProperties.description: Return to Ikora Rey in the Tower Bazaar.

setData.questStepSummary:
Ghosts can resurrect their Guardians in the midst of combat, but Maeve died a true death when her Ghost was crushed by Navôta.

This is the risk that every Guardian takes when facing the enemies of humanity.

displayProperties.description: Commune with the Traveler to learn its lesson.
displayProperties.name: Learning Light

setData.questLineDescription: Learn how Guardians become more powerful and strengthen your connection to the Light.
setData.questStepSummary:
Shaw Han said that all Guardians learn to speak to the Traveler in their own way. Though it may not speak back, the lessons it provides in the Light always make Guardians stronger. He didn't offer specifics on how the lessons work, but suggested meditation as a first step.

It's worth a shot. Ghost says he knows a good place to start.

displayProperties.description: Return to Shaw Han and tell him of what you learned.
displayProperties.name: Learning Light

setData.questLineDescription: Learn how Guardians become more powerful and strengthen your connection to the Light.
setData.questStepSummary:
Shaw Han led you true. You communed with the Traveler and received its lesson. With the help of Maeve's Light that you recovered, you have become stronger.

 Where will you find the next step of your journey?

Some Solar abilities Scorch your targets. Scorched targets take damage over time, and this damage increases as your target accumulates Scorch stacks. After enough Scorch stacks are applied, your foes ignite in a large explosion.

To make progress, equip abilities, aspects, fragments, or gear with the Scorch keyword. For example, the Ember of Char fragment makes your Solar Ignitions spread Scorch to affected targets.

displayProperties.description:
Failsafe has detected an energy signature on Nessus matching that of NES002. She has dubbed it NES002-C and requests your on-the-ground assistance with hunting it down. She's excited to try out her new proximity sensor.

Complete a run of Breach Executable and locate NES002-C.
displayProperties.name: A Rising Chorus: Act I

setData.questStepSummary: NES002-C is likely to look similar to the other specimen you have already collected.

setData.questStepSummary: A commanding presence known as the Conductor seems to be responsible for the strange behavior of the Vex on Nessus. You saved Saint-14 from being questioned by the voice, but he seems deeply shaken by the ordeal…

displayProperties.description: Complete Battleground: Delve on Nessus.
displayProperties.name: A Rising Chorus: Act II

setData.questStepSummary: Confront the enemies of humanity on Nessus in Battleground: Delve.

displayProperties.description:
Your Radiolite Sampler can extract and isolate unique segments of mutated radiolaria within discovered nodes of radiolite.

Use your Radiolite Sampler to extract Vex code mutations from Radiolite Incubators within Episode: Echoes activities. Extracting from Iridescent Incubators provides the greatest chance to find the code mutations.

Failsafe will need these resources to upgrade her H.E.L.M. equipment and add more research bays before she can start her analysis of the Hydra tail obtained from Battleground: Delve.
displayProperties.name: A Rising Chorus: Act II

setData.questStepSummary: Activate Planetary Pistons within Episode: Echoes activities to spawn Iridescent Radiolite Incubators.

displayProperties.description: Return to the H.E.L.M. to activate Failsafe's upgrade protocol.
displayProperties.name: A Rising Chorus: Act II

setData.questStepSummary: Activate Failsafe's upgrade protocol at her remote uplink in the H.E.L.M.

displayProperties.name: A Rising Chorus: Act II

setData.questStepSummary: Now that Failsafe and the Radiolite Sampler are upgraded, new forms of Radiolite can be found on Nessus.

displayProperties.description: Speak with Failsafe in the H.E.L.M. to unlock a new research bay.
displayProperties.name: A Rising Chorus: Act II

setData.questStepSummary: A new research bay can be unlocked by speaking with Failsafe in the H.E.L.M.

setData.questStepSummary:
Excavate Radiolite to gather the materials Failsafe requires to fabricate her tracking nanomachines.

Radiolite can be most commonly found within Breach Executable and Seasonal Battlegrounds activities.

Episode: Echoes Act II complete.
Failsafe will contact you when Act III begins.

setData.questStepSummary:
The Conductor has been revealed to be Maya Sundaresh, a Golden-Age scientist long trapped in the Vex network. She wields the Echo of Command, an object of incredible power created by the Witness's death.  
Unless she is stopped, she will use it to spread radiolaria throughout the Sol system, transforming all into her willing Vex…
